scripts.build-----README-----: Build all projects within the monorepo once and check for any errors in the projects.
scripts.release-----README-----: Release all projects within the monorepo.
scripts.release: pnpm run release:bump && pnpm run release:publish
scripts.release:bump-------README---: Generate a changelog and create a new version number for all projects based on commits.
scripts.release:publish----README---: All ongoing projects that have not yet been published will be released accordingly.
scripts.clean-----README-----: Delete the node_modules directory and all files and directories generated by the project
scripts.prepare-----README-----: Configuration related to the initial setup of git pre-commit hooks
